posts.post_content:
I'm searching for a nice T205 Clark Griffith for my Cincinnati team set.

T205

  * 90% of gold border
  * No creases
  * No paper loss (small corner tears okay)
  * No trimming




Preferred Backs: Honest LC, Polar Bear, Sweet Cap Factory 25, Sweet Cap Red



Please take a look at the 3 Gold Borders I currently have [URL="http://bailencards.com/stevens-collection/t206-cincinnati/"]here[/URL]. I need something that will fit with these 3 cards.



PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], any scans and prices.
Bump for a good weekend?!? Can someone help out with at least one of these cards by Sunday?

Bump


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
